newsitem.title: UK: P&O says restructuring to constrain H1.
newsitem.headline: P&O says restructuring to constrain H1.

text.p: Britain's Peninsular & Oriental Steam Navigation Co said on Friday that the cost of restructuring its container and ferry operations would constrain its first half results in the current year.

"Underlying profitability is now set to improve sharply, although the cost of restructuring in containers and ferries will constrain this year's results at least in the first half," the company's chairman Lord Sterling told the annual meeting.
The chairman said that the measures being taken would come through strongly in 1998 leading to above average return to shareholders.
Lord Sterling also said that the group's Bovis Homes housebuilding unit will be floated in late autumn this year.
"With the continuing improvement in the housing market we are confident that this will provide the best opportunity to realise shareholder value," he said.
